posts.content:
For those who remember me, the day has come for me and my bus to part!

For those who don't know me, look at my thread on Rides and Projects from a few years back ,

viewtopic.php?f=8&t=24616

And look at my fine bus, which is now up for sale.

She is currently in at Linc's Restos having a few little age issues sorted and the lower half resprayed, and then she'll be in the same great condition she was after the main resto, 10/11 years ago.

The picture below is from the original resto, the roofrack is a little gnarlier these days, and the belt trim has been outside as well.
The paint is glossy now, no longer matt.
But she still looks and sounds lovely.




Looking for 25k.
All messages will be replied to asap.
Very nice mate, any pics of the interior, where are you based ?

I have no pics of the interior to hand,
But I'll try and get up to the workshop and take some.
And I'm based in Lincoln these days.
